sourcesContent:
<template>
  <swiper
    style="overflow: hidden !important; height: 100%;"
    :slides-per-view="1"
    :loop="false"
    :modules="modules"
    @swiper="onSwiper"
    :watchSlidesProgress="true"
    class="swiper swiper-pagination-bullets swiper-horizontal swiper-css-mode swiper-watch-progress swiper-backface-hidden"
  >
    <swiper-slide><promo /></swiper-slide>
    <swiper-slide><genres /></swiper-slide>
  </swiper>
</template>

<script>
import TheSlideGroup from "../components/carousels/TheSlideGroup.vue";
import Lazy from "../components/lazy/Lazy.vue";
import {Swiper, SwiperSlide} from "swiper-vue2";
import SwiperCore, {Mousewheel, Keyboard, EffectFlip, Pagination} from 'swiper';
import 'swiper/swiper-bundle.css';
import "swiper/components/effect-flip/effect-flip.scss"
import Promo from "../components/Promo.vue";
import Genres from "../components/Genres.vue";
SwiperCore.use([Mousewheel, Keyboard, EffectFlip, Pagination]);

export default {
  name: "IndexView",
  components: {Genres, Promo, Lazy, TheSlideGroup, Swiper, SwiperSlide},
  data: () => ({
    pageName: "",
    height: 0,
  }),
  setup() {
    return {
      modules: [Mousewheel, Keyboard, EffectFlip]
    }
  },
  methods: {
    onSwiper (swiper) {
      console.log(swiper)
    },
    onSlideChange () {
      console.log('slide change')
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
